metadata.description:
10-Page Preview!

Suitani never wanted a normal life, but that's what he has. And he loathes it. When he runs into Tamaki again, the small boy he bullied in the past and now a gorgeous television hero, he realizes Tamaki is everything he is not. But Tamaki hasn't forgiven Suitani's past cruelties, and suddenly, "normal" is a lifeline.

Unusual reflections on love is the underlying theme of AWAKENED DREAMER, some filled with beautiful sadness, others with imaginative humor. ----------Translated by Barbara J. Vincent; Edited by Kimberly Lammens; Lettered by Alexandra Gunawan
metadata.name: Awakened Dreamer
